<script>
/** 
 * AIDA Master - All-in-One (v2.3)
 * Attention (5s) → Intention (8s) → Desire (≥8s & ≥3 clicks)
 * Placeholders: GA4 G-000000000 | Ads AW-000000000 (ATT000/INT000/DES000) | Meta 000000000000
 */
(function() {
  var CONFIG = { GA4_ID:'G-000000000', ADS_ID:'AW-000000000',
    ADS_LABELS:{ATT:'ATT000',INT:'INT000',DES:'DES000'}, META_PIXEL_ID:'000000000000' };
  function nowTs(){return (new Date()).getTime();}
  function uuid4(){var d=(new Date()).getTime(),d2=(performance&&performance.now&&(performance.now()*1000))||0;
    return'xxxxxxxx-xxxx-4xxx-yxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx'.replace(/[xy]/g,function(c){var r=Math.random()*16;
    if(d>0){r=(d+r)%16|0;d=Math.floor(d/16);}else{r=(d2+r)%16|0;d2=Math.floor(d2/16);}return(c==='x'?r:(r&0x3|0x8)).toString(16);});}
  function safePush(o){window.dataLayer=window.dataLayer||[];window.dataLayer.push(o);}
  function secondsSince(ts){return Math.max(0,Math.round((nowTs()-ts)/1000));}
  if(window.__AIDA_MASTER_INIT__)return; window.__AIDA_MASTER_INIT__=true;
  window.dataLayer=window.dataLayer||[]; safePush({event:'aida_bootstrap'});
  (function(){ if(CONFIG.GA4_ID!=='G-000000000'){ if(!window.__gtagLoaded__){
    window.__gtagLoaded__=true; var s=document.createElement('script'); s.async=true;
    s.src='https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtag/js?id='+encodeURIComponent(CONFIG.GA4_ID);
    document.head.appendChild(s); window.dataLayer=window.dataLayer||[];
    window.gtag=window.gtag||function(){dataLayer.push(arguments);};
    gtag('js',new Date()); gtag('config',CONFIG.GA4_ID);} } })();
  (function(){ if(CONFIG.ADS_ID!=='AW-000000000'){
    window.dataLayer=window.dataLayer||[]; window.gtag=window.gtag||function(){dataLayer.push(arguments);};
    gtag('config',CONFIG.ADS_ID);} })();
  (function(){ if(CONFIG.META_PIXEL_ID!=='000000000000'){ if(!window.fbq){
    !function(f,b,e,v,n,t,s){if(f.fbq)return;n=f.fbq=function(){n.callMethod?
    n.callMethod.apply(n,arguments):n.queue.push(arguments)};if(!f._fbq)f._fbq=n;
    n.push=n;n.loaded=!0;n.version='2.0';n.queue=[];t=b.createElement(e);t.async=!0;
    t.src=v;s=b.getElementsByTagName(e)[0];s.parentNode.insertBefore(t,s)}(window,document,'script','https://connect.facebook.net/en_US/fbevents.js');}
    if(!window.__fbInited__){window.__fbInited__=true; fbq('init',CONFIG.META_PIXEL_ID,{}, {autoConfig:true});}} })();
  var SS=window.sessionStorage; try{
    if(!SS.getItem('aida_session_start_ts'))SS.setItem('aida_session_start_ts',String(nowTs()));
    if(!SS.getItem('gtm_session_click_count'))SS.setItem('gtm_session_click_count','0');
    if(!SS.getItem('gtm_aida_stage_reached'))SS.setItem('gtm_aida_stage_reached','None');
  }catch(e){SS={_m:{},getItem:function(k){return this._m[k];},setItem:function(k,v){this._m[k]=v;},removeItem:function(k){delete this._m[k];}};
    SS.setItem('aida_session_start_ts',String(nowTs())); SS.setItem('gtm_session_click_count','0'); SS.setItem('gtm_aida_stage_reached','None');}
  var sessionStart=parseInt(SS.getItem('aida_session_start_ts')||String(nowTs()),10);
  var stageOrder={'None':0,'Att':1,'Int':2,'De':3}; var timers={t5:false,t8:false}; var eventIdBase=uuid4();
  function getStage(){return SS.getItem('gtm_aida_stage_reached')||'None';}
  function setStage(s){try{SS.setItem('gtm_aida_stage_reached',s);}catch(e){}}
  function getClicks(){return parseInt(SS.getItem('gtm_session_click_count')||'0',10);}
  function setClicks(n){try{SS.setItem('gtm_session_click_count',String(n));}catch(e){}}
  function dispatchAll(stage,eid){var payload={event_id:eid,aida_stage:stage,session_clicks:getClicks(),dwell_seconds:secondsSince(sessionStart)};
    var dl=(stage==='Att'?'aida_attention_event':(stage==='Int'?'aida_intention_event':'aida_desire_event')); safePush(Object.assign({event:dl},payload));
    if(CONFIG.GA4_ID!=='G-000000000'&&typeof window.gtag==='function'){var n=(stage==='Att'?'aida_attention':(stage==='Int'?'aida_intention':'aida_desire')); gtag('event',n,payload);}
    if(CONFIG.ADS_ID!=='AW-000000000'&&typeof window.gtag==='function'){var L=(stage==='Att'?CONFIG.ADS_LABELS.ATT:(stage==='Int'?CONFIG.ADS_LABELS.INT:CONFIG.ADS_LABELS.DES));
      if(L&&!/^0+$/.test(L)){gtag('event','conversion',{'send_to':CONFIG.ADS_ID+'/'+L,'event_id':payload.event_id,'aida_stage':payload.aida_stage,'session_clicks':payload.session_clicks,'dwell_seconds':payload.dwell_seconds});}}
    if(CONFIG.META_PIXEL_ID!=='000000000000'&&typeof window.fbq==='function'){var m=(stage==='Att'?'AIDA_Attention':(stage==='Int'?'AIDA_Intention':'AIDA_Desire')); fbq('trackCustom',m,payload,{eventID:payload.event_id});}}
  function maybeFire(target){var cur=getStage(); if(stageOrder[target]>stageOrder[cur]){setStage(target); dispatchAll(target,eventIdBase+'-'+target);}}
  function checkDesire(){ if(timers.t8 && getClicks()>=3){ maybeFire('De'); } }
  if(!window.__AIDA_CLICK_BOUND__){window.__AIDA_CLICK_BOUND__=true; document.addEventListener('click',function(){var c=getClicks()+1; setClicks(c); safePush({event:'aida_click_increment',session_clicks:c}); checkDesire();},true);}
  setTimeout(function(){timers.t5=true; maybeFire('Att');},5000);
  setTimeout(function(){timers.t8=true; maybeFire('Int'); checkDesire();},8000);
  document.addEventListener('visibilitychange',function(){ if(!document.hidden) checkDesire(); });
})();
</script>
